text:
Table 3: Calculating NPV. With the HP120
Key Strokes
Explanation
[f]+[FIN] — [f] — [REG]
Clear memory registers
[f] [5]
Display 5 decimals. You only need to
do this once.
2,000 [CHS] [g] [CF0]
Initial cash outlay
1,000 [g] [CFj]
Period 1 cash flow
800 [g] [CFj]
Period 2 cash flow
600 [g] [CFj]
Period 3 cash flow
200 [g] [CFj]
Period 4 cash flow
10 [i]
10% discount rate
[f] (NPV)
Calculate NPV
